https://tmrev.io/movie/283044-An Aqueous Solution 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h3ydPvTWvZbdVNvY80SWDbyb492.jpg This short animation is bleak and apparently grim, but it is an assertive statement on self-determination and the fundamental need for both dark and light. This film was made as part of the first edition of the NFB's Hothouse apprenticeship. An Aqueous Solution
